member.name: T:Insight.Database.SqlExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods specifically for SQL Server

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlExtensions.ExecuteXml(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand)
member.summary: Executes a FOR XML command and returns the results as a single XmlDocument.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlExtensions.QueryXml(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.String,System.Object,System.Data.CommandType,System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes a FOR XML query and returns the result as a single XmlDocument.
member.param: An optional timeout for the command.
An optional transaction to participate in.
An optional object to send the output parameters to. This may be the same as parameters.

member.summary: Determines if a parameter is a Table-valued parameter.

member.summary: Returns SQL that queries a table for the schema only, no rows.
member.param: The name of the table to query.
member.returns: SQL that queries a table for the schema only, no rows.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlInsightDbProvider.IsXmlColumn(System.Data.DataTable,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines if the given column in the schema table is an XML column.
member.returns: True if the column is an XML column.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlInsightDbProvider.BulkCopy(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Data.IDataReader,System.Action{Insight.Database.InsightBulkCopy},Insight.Database.InsightBulkCopyOptions,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Bulk copies a set of objects to the server.
member.param: The reader to read objects from.
A callback method to configure the bulk copy object.
Options for initializing the bulk copy object.
An optional transaction to participate in.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlInsightDbProvider.BulkCopyAsync(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Data.IDataReader,System.Action{Insight.Database.InsightBulkCopy},Insight.Database.InsightBulkCopyOptions,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously bulk copies a set of objects to the server.
member.param: The reader to read objects from.
A callback method to configure the bulk copy object.
Options for initializing the bulk copy object.
An optional transaction to participate in.
The cancellation token that can be used to cancel the operation.
member.remarks: Number of rows copied if supported, -1 otherwise.
member.returns: A task representing the completion of the operation.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlInsightDbProvider.IsTransientException(System.Exception)
member.summary: Determines if a database exception is a transient exception and if the operation could be retried.
member.returns: True if the exception is transient.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlInsightDbProvider.AdjustSqlParameters(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand)
member.summary: Fixes various issues with deriving parameters from SQL Server.
member.remarks: If the current user doesn't have execute permissions the type of a parameter, DeriveParameters won't return the parameter. This is very difficult to debug, so we are going to check to make sure that we got all of the parameters.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlInsightDbProvider.GetTableTypeSchema(System.Data.IDbCommand,System.Data.IDataParameter)
member.summary: Gets the schema for a given user-defined table type.
member.returns: An open reader with the schema.
member.remarks: The caller is responsible for closing the reader and the connection.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlInsightDbProvider.GetTableParameterTypeName(System.Data.IDataParameter,System.Type)
member.summary: Calculates the table type name for a table parameter.
member.param: The type of object being stored in the table.
member.returns: The name of the table parameter.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlInsightDbProvider.IsSqlUserDefinedType(System.Type)
member.summary: Determines if a type is a sql user defined type.
member.returns: True if it is a Sql UDT.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlInsightDbProvider.PrepareBulkCopy(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.String,System.Data.IDataReader,System.Action{Insight.Database.InsightBulkCopy},Insight.Database.InsightBulkCopyOptions,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Prepares the bulk copy operation.
member.param: The reader to read objects from.
A callback method to configure the bulk copy object.
Options for initializing the bulk copy object.
An optional transaction to participate in.
